org.eclipse.egf.model.provider
Class ContextElementItemProvider

java.lang.Object
  ItemProviderAdapter
      org.eclipse.egf.model.provider.NamedModelElementWithIdItemProvider
          org.eclipse.egf.model.provider.ContextElementItemProvider

public class ContextElementItemProvider
extends NamedModelElementWithIdItemProvider

This is the item provider adapter for a ContextElement object.
